Author: LowCalPal
Text: There is virtually zero possibility that your eating disorder has caused lasting endocrine damage.  The human body has numerous protective measures to withstand periods of poor nutrition, otherwise we as a species would never have survived to reproduce after our first famine.  If you are worried about your testosterone level, the best thing to do is to tell your doctor and ask them to test you.  If your testosterone level *is* too low, for whatever reason, that is a treatable condition.
